item.title: The Ballad of Electric Vehicle
item.description: In past couple of weeks, I have immensely interested in electric vehicle. Partially because the price increase of Fossil fuel as well as a curiosity why electric vehicle is adopted very slowly anywhere in this word. At first I have these 2 conclusion: Non - Renewable Energy Business Disadvantages Huge Investment due to low demand test test
